roleset.name: update structure
roleset.note: REFURBISH-V NOTES: Instrumental arg? Perhaps. (from refurbish.01-v)

example.name: unspecified agent
example.text: Proceeds from the offering are expected to be used for *trace* remodeling the company's Desert Inn resort in Las Vegas, refurbishing certain aircraft of the MGM Grand Air unit, and to acquire the property for the new resort.
example.arg: certain aircraft of the MGM Grand Air unit
